name: NEFT RTGS
query:
select 
"N" as "Transaction Type",

NULL as "Blank",

nr.party_bank_account as "Beneficiary Account Number",

nr.paid_amount as "Instrument Amount",

nr.party_name as "Beneficiary Name",

NULL as "Blank",

NULL as "Blank",

NULL as "Beneficiary Address 1",
NULL as "Beneficiary Address 2",
NULL as "Beneficiary Address 3",
NULL as "Beneficiary Address 4",
NULL as "Beneficiary Address 5",

NULL as "Instruction Reference Number",

NULL as "Customer Reference Number",

NULL as "Payment Details 1",

NULL as "Payment Details 2",
NULL as "Payment Details 3",
NULL as "Payment Details 4",
NULL as "Payment Details 5",
NULL as "Payment Details 6",
NULL as "Payment Details 7",

NULL as "Blank",

nr.posting_date as "Transaction Date",

NULL as "Blank",

NULL as "IFSC Code",

NULL as "Bank Name",

NULL as "Branch Name",
 
NULL as "Email ID"

from `tabPayment Entry` nr where nr.custom_neftrtgs != "Fund Transfer" AND docstatus != 2  AND  docstatus != 0

name: Export order in Hand
query:
SELECT 
  po.supplier_name AS 'Name Of the Party',
  po.name AS 'P.O.No',
  po.transaction_date AS 'P.O.Date',
  po.total AS 'P.O.Amount(FC)',
  po.terms AS 'Terms',
  po.conversion_rate AS 'Exchange Rate',
  po.currency AS 'Currency',
  po.base_net_total AS 'Amount Rs.'
FROM `tabPurchase Order` po
LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Invoice` pi ON po.name = pi.custom_purchase_order
WHERE po.currency != 'INR' 
  AND pi.name IS NULL
  AND (
    (%(from_date)s IS NULL AND %(to_date)s IS NULL) 
    OR (po.transaction_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s)  
  )
  AND po.company = %(company)s
;

name: Export order in Hand2
query:
SELECT 
  po.supplier_name AS 'Name Of the Party',
  po.name AS 'P.O.No',
  po.transaction_date AS 'P.O.Date',
  po.total AS 'P.O.Amount(FC)',
  '10.00' as 'Freight',
  '650.00' as 'Insurance',
  po.payment_terms_template AS 'Terms',
  (
    SELECT 
      exchange_rate
    FROM `tabCurrency Exchange`
    WHERE from_currency = po.currency
      AND date = po.transaction_date
    LIMIT 1
  ) AS 'Exchange Rate',
  po.currency AS 'Currency',
  po.base_net_total AS 'Amount Rs.'
FROM `tabPurchase Order` po
LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Invoice` pi ON po.name = pi.custom_purchase_order
WHERE po.currency != 'INR' 
  AND pi.name IS NULL
  AND (
    (%(from_date)s IS NULL AND %(to_date)s IS NULL) 
    OR (po.transaction_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s)  
  );

name: Entry Reports
query:
columns = [
    {
        'fieldname': 'today_date',
        'label': _('Date'),
        'fieldtype': 'Data',
        'options': '',
        'width': 300
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'document_type',
        'label': _('Order'),
        'fieldtype': 'Data',
        'options': '',
        'width': 300
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'creation_count',
        'label': _('Number'),
        'fieldtype': 'Data',
        'options': '',
        'width': 300
    }
    
    
]

filter_values = ()  # Initialize the filter_values tuple

if filters.get('from_date') and filters.get('to_date'):
    mysql = """
        SELECT 'Sales Order' AS document_type, transaction_date AS today_date, COUNT(name) AS creation_count
        FROM `tabSales Order`
        WHERE DATE(transaction_date) BETWEEN %s AND %s
        UNION ALL
        SELECT 'Sales Invoice' AS document_type, posting_date AS today_date, COUNT(name) AS creation_count
        FROM `tabSales Invoice`
        WHERE DATE(posting_date) BETWEEN %s AND %s
        UNION ALL
        SELECT 'Purchase Invoice' AS document_type, posting_date AS today_date, COUNT(name) AS creation_count
        FROM `tabPurchase Invoice`
        WHERE DATE(posting_date) BETWEEN %s AND %s
        UNION ALL
        SELECT 'Purchase Order' AS document_type, transaction_date AS today_date, COUNT(name) AS creation_count
        FROM `tabPurchase Order`
        WHERE DATE(transaction_date) BETWEEN %s AND %s
    """

    filter_values = (
        filters.get('from_date'),  # From Date
        filters.get('to_date'),    # To Date
        filters.get('from_date'),  # From Date (Sales Invoice)
        filters.get('to_date'),    # To Date (Sales Invoice)
        filters.get('from_date'),  # From Date (Purchase Invoice)
        filters.get('to_date'),    # To Date (Purchase Invoice)
        filters.get('from_date'),  # From Date (Purchase Order)
        filters.get('to_date'),    # To Date (Purchase Order)
    )

else:
    mysql = """
       SELECT 'Sales Order' AS document_type, CURDATE() AS today_date, COUNT(name) AS creation_count
        FROM `tabSales Order`
        WHERE DATE(transaction_date) = CURDATE()
        UNION ALL
        SELECT 'Sales Invoice' AS document_type, CURDATE() AS today_date, COUNT(name) AS creation_count
        FROM `tabSales Invoice`
        WHERE DATE(posting_date) = CURDATE()
        UNION ALL
        SELECT 'Purchase Invoice' AS document_type, CURDATE() AS today_date, COUNT(name) AS creation_count
        FROM `tabPurchase Invoice`
        WHERE DATE(posting_date) = CURDATE()
        UNION ALL
        SELECT 'Purchase Order' AS document_type, CURDATE() AS today_date, COUNT(name) AS creation_count
        FROM `tabPurchase Order`
        WHERE DATE(transaction_date) = CURDATE()
    """

# Execute the SQL query with the filter values
mydata = frappe.db.sql(mysql, filter_values, as_dict=True)

data = (columns, mydata, "entry reports", None, None)
report_script:
columns = [
    {
        'fieldname': 'today_date',
        'label': _('Date'),
        'fieldtype': 'Data',
        'options': '',
        'width': 300
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'document_type',
        'label': _('Order'),
        'fieldtype': 'Data',
        'options': '',
        'width': 300
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'creation_count',
        'label': _('Number'),
        'fieldtype': 'Data',
        'options': '',
        'width': 300
    },{
        'fieldname': 'status',
        'label': _('Status'),
        'fieldtype': 'Data',
        'options': '',
        'width': 300
    }
    
    
]

filter_values = ()  # Initialize the filter_values tuple

if filters.get('from_date') and filters.get('to_date'):
    mysql = """
        SELECT 'Sales Order' AS document_type, transaction_date AS today_date, COUNT(name) AS creation_count,status
        FROM `tabSales Order`
        WHERE DATE(transaction_date) BETWEEN %s AND %s
        UNION ALL
        SELECT 'Sales Invoice' AS document_type, posting_date AS today_date, COUNT(name) AS creation_count,status
        FROM `tabSales Invoice`
        WHERE DATE(posting_date) BETWEEN %s AND %s
        UNION ALL
        SELECT 'Purchase Invoice' AS document_type, posting_date AS today_date, COUNT(name) AS creation_count,status
        FROM `tabPurchase Invoice`
        WHERE DATE(posting_date) BETWEEN %s AND %s
        UNION ALL
        SELECT 'Purchase Order' AS document_type, transaction_date AS today_date, COUNT(name) AS creation_count,status
        FROM `tabPurchase Order`
        WHERE DATE(transaction_date) BETWEEN %s AND %s
    """

    filter_values = (
        filters.get('from_date'),  # From Date
        filters.get('to_date'),    # To Date
        filters.get('from_date'),  # From Date (Sales Invoice)
        filters.get('to_date'),    # To Date (Sales Invoice)
        filters.get('from_date'),  # From Date (Purchase Invoice)
        filters.get('to_date'),    # To Date (Purchase Invoice)
        filters.get('from_date'),  # From Date (Purchase Order)
        filters.get('to_date'),    # To Date (Purchase Order)
    )

else:
    mysql = """
       SELECT 'Sales Order' AS document_type, CURDATE() AS today_date, COUNT(name) AS creation_count,status
        FROM `tabSales Order`
        WHERE DATE(transaction_date) = CURDATE()
        UNION ALL
        SELECT 'Sales Invoice' AS document_type, CURDATE() AS today_date, COUNT(name) AS creation_count,status
        FROM `tabSales Invoice`
        WHERE DATE(posting_date) = CURDATE()
        UNION ALL
        SELECT 'Purchase Invoice' AS document_type, CURDATE() AS today_date, COUNT(name) AS creation_count,status
        FROM `tabPurchase Invoice`
        WHERE DATE(posting_date) = CURDATE()
        UNION ALL
        SELECT 'Purchase Order' AS document_type, CURDATE() AS today_date, COUNT(name) AS creation_count,status
        FROM `tabPurchase Order`
        WHERE DATE(transaction_date) = CURDATE()
    """

# Execute the SQL query with the filter values
mydata = frappe.db.sql(mysql, filter_values, as_dict=True)

data = (columns, mydata, "entry reports", None, None)

name: HSN Wise Summery Detailed
query:
SELECT
    NULL AS Type_Cd,
    si.name AS Invoice_Number,
    si.posting_date AS Invoice_Date,
    siuom.gst_hsn_code AS HSN,
    i.item_group AS Make,
    gst_uom_map.uqc AS UQC,
    siuom.item_name AS Item_Name,
    siuom.qty AS Qty,
    siuom.rate AS Rate,
    siuom.amount AS Amount,
    si.currency AS Currency,
    NULL AS Bond_Rebate,
    si.total AS Basic_Value,
    NULL AS Other_Charge,
    NULL AS Bill_Value,
    si.total AS Taxable_Value,
    
    CASE
        WHEN si.tax_category = 'Out-State' THEN stc.base_tax_amount
        ELSE NULL
    END AS IGST,
    CASE
        WHEN si.tax_category = 'In-State' THEN stc.base_tax_amount
        ELSE NULL
    END AS CGST,
    CASE
        WHEN si.tax_category = 'In-State' THEN stc.base_tax_amount
        ELSE NULL
    END AS SGST,
    
    CASE
        WHEN si.disable_rounded_total = 1 THEN si.grand_total
        ELSE si.rounded_total
    END AS Inv_Value,
    
    SUM(stc.rate) AS GST_total
    
FROM
    `tabSales Invoice Item` siuom
JOIN
    `tabSales Invoice` si ON siuom.parent = si.name
LEFT JOIN
    `tabSales Taxes and Charges` stc ON si.name = stc.parent
LEFT JOIN
    `tabItem` i ON siuom.item_code = i.item_code
LEFT JOIN
    (SELECT
        parent,
        uom,
        gst_uom AS uqc
    FROM
        `tabGST UOM Map`) gst_uom_map ON siuom.uom = gst_uom_map.uom
WHERE
    si.docstatus = 1

GROUP BY
    si.name,
    si.posting_date,
    siuom.gst_hsn_code,
    i.item_group,
    siuom.uom,
    siuom.item_name,
    gst_uom_map.uqc,
    siuom.rate,
    siuom.amount,
    si.currency,
    si.total,
    si.tax_category,
    si.disable_rounded_total;

name: HSN Wise Summery Detailed From Purchase Invoice
query:
SELECT
    NULL AS Type_Cd,
    pi.name AS Invoice_Number,
    pi.posting_date AS Invoice_Date,
    piuom.gst_hsn_code AS HSN,
    i.item_group AS Make,
    gst_uom_map.uqc AS UQC,
    piuom.item_name AS Item_Name,
    piuom.qty AS Qty,
    piuom.rate AS Rate,
    piuom.amount AS Amount,
    pi.currency AS Currency,
    NULL AS Bond_Rebate,
    pi.total AS Basic_Value,
    NULL AS Other_Charge,
    NULL AS Bill_Value,
    pi.total AS Taxable_Value,
    
    CASE
        WHEN pi.tax_category = 'Out-State' THEN ptc.base_tax_amount
        ELSE NULL
    END AS IGST,
    CASE
        WHEN pi.tax_category = 'In-State' THEN ptc.base_tax_amount
        ELSE NULL
    END AS CGST,
    CASE
        WHEN pi.tax_category = 'In-State' THEN ptc.base_tax_amount
        ELSE NULL
    END AS SGST,
    
    CASE
        WHEN pi.disable_rounded_total = 1 THEN pi.grand_total
        ELSE pi.rounded_total
    END AS Inv_Value,
    
    SUM(ptc.rate) AS GST_total
    
FROM
    `tabPurchase Invoice Item` piuom
JOIN
    `tabPurchase Invoice` pi ON piuom.parent = pi.name
LEFT JOIN
    `tabPurchase Taxes and Charges` ptc ON pi.name = ptc.parent
LEFT JOIN
    `tabItem` i ON piuom.item_code = i.item_code
LEFT JOIN
    (SELECT
        parent,
        uom,
        gst_uom AS uqc
    FROM
        `tabGST UOM Map`) gst_uom_map ON piuom.uom = gst_uom_map.uom
WHERE
    pi.docstatus = 1 AND piuom.gst_hsn_code != ""
GROUP BY
    pi.name,
    pi.posting_date,
    piuom.gst_hsn_code,
    i.item_group,
    gst_uom_map.uqc,
    piuom.item_name,
    piuom.qty,
    piuom.rate,
    piuom.amount,
    pi.currency,
    pi.total,
    pi.tax_category,
    pi.disable_rounded_total;
report_name: HSN Wise Summery Detailed From Purchase Invoice

name: HSN Wise Inward Summery
query:
SELECT
    NULL AS Type_Cd,
    pi.name AS Invoice_Number,
    pi.posting_date AS Invoice_Date,
    piuom.gst_hsn_code AS HSN,
    i.item_group AS Make,
    gst_uom_map.uqc AS UQC,
    piuom.item_name AS Item_Name,
    piuom.qty AS Qty,
    piuom.rate AS Rate,
    piuom.amount AS Amount,
    pi.currency AS Currency,
    NULL AS Bond_Rebate,
    pi.total AS Basic_Value,
    NULL AS Other_Charge,
    NULL AS Bill_Value,
    pi.total AS Taxable_Value,
    
    CASE
        WHEN pi.tax_category = 'Out-State' THEN ptc.base_tax_amount
        ELSE NULL
    END AS IGST,
    CASE
        WHEN pi.tax_category = 'In-State' THEN ptc.base_tax_amount
        ELSE NULL
    END AS CGST,
    CASE
        WHEN pi.tax_category = 'In-State' THEN ptc.base_tax_amount
        ELSE NULL
    END AS SGST,
    
    CASE
        WHEN pi.disable_rounded_total = 1 THEN pi.grand_total
        ELSE pi.rounded_total
    END AS Inv_Value,
    
    SUM(ptc.rate) AS GST_total
    
FROM
    `tabPurchase Invoice Item` piuom
JOIN
    `tabPurchase Invoice` pi ON piuom.parent = pi.name
LEFT JOIN
    `tabPurchase Taxes and Charges` ptc ON pi.name = ptc.parent
LEFT JOIN
    `tabItem` i ON piuom.item_code = i.item_code
LEFT JOIN
    (SELECT
        parent,
        uom,
        gst_uom AS uqc
    FROM
        `tabGST UOM Map`) gst_uom_map ON piuom.uom = gst_uom_map.uom
WHERE
    pi.docstatus = 1 AND piuom.gst_hsn_code != ""
GROUP BY
    pi.name,
    pi.posting_date,
    piuom.gst_hsn_code,
    i.item_group,
    gst_uom_map.uqc,
    piuom.item_name,
    piuom.qty,
    piuom.rate,
    piuom.amount,
    pi.currency,
    pi.total,
    pi.tax_category,
    pi.disable_rounded_total;
